about_the_game:
Albert Aardt is the captain of the space ship BRT-34, which has been drifting on the far edge of the milky way due to an engine malfunction for more than 200 years. One day, the cryo tube of the Association of Free Scientists - the destroyed organization that once belonged to albert-materializes next to his ship. Having picked up the cryo tube, the captain receives an order for its delivery.

The game is a mix of a visual novel, a classic quest, and a turn-based RPG. However, if you want, you can disable the RPG component, and enjoy the game as a normal visual novel with quest elements!

content_descriptors.notes: The game contains scenes of violence and cruelty, scenes of an erotic nature, and profanity. All Nude characters are over 18 years old.

detailed_description:
Albert Aardt is the captain of the space ship BRT-34, which has been drifting on the far edge of the milky way due to an engine malfunction for more than 200 years. Having picked up the cryo tube, the captain receives an order for its delivery.

The game is a mix of a visual novel, a classic quest, and a turn-based RPG. However, if you want, you can disable the RPG component, and enjoy the game as a normal visual novel with quest elements!
name: Protocol Endfall

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Microsoft® Windows® XP/Vista/7/8/8.1/10
  • Processor: Pentium® 4 1.5 GHz / Athlon® XP
  • Memory: 1024 MB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c

short_description: You are the captain of a space ship lost in time and space. You receive an order for delivery of a special cargo from an organization that has been considered destroyed for hundreds of years. What are your next steps?
